name: Aditya Shahi
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: Motivated Computer Science student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, with a strong academic background in programming, data structures, algorithms, and computer organization. Proficient in Java and familiar with Python, equipped with a solid understanding of core computer science principles. Eager to leverage skills in coding and problem-solving to contribute to innovative projects and gain practical experience in the tech industry. A quick learner with a keen interest in AI technologies and a commitment to developing impactful solutions through hands-on learning and collaboration.

certifications.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Indian Currency Classifier
projects.description: Developed a classifier to identify and categorize Indian currency notes using machine learning and deep learning techniques. Utilized convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for image recognition, achieving high accuracy in distinguishing between various denominations.

experiences.description: Played a pivotal role as a subtitles writer at Rev, producing high-quality and accurate subtitles for a diverse range of content & also generated a good revenue out of it.

full_output.name: Aditya Shahi
